types.html:
hautes sphères f pl (plural only)

  1. higher spheres, higher circles, upper echelons
    les hautes sphères du pouvoir ― the corridors of power

Usage notes

[edit]
  • Used with the definite article les, and followed by a possessive phrase introduced by de.
trans: higher spheres, higher circles, upper echelons
higher spheres, higher circles, upper echelons
higher spheres, higher circles, upper echelons
higher spheres, higher circles, upper echelons

title: hautes sphères
